name: better-auth
description: Build authentication systems for TypeScript/Cloudflare Workers with social auth, 2FA, passkeys, organizations, RBAC, and OAuth 2.1 provider capabilities. Self-hosted alternative to Clerk/Auth.js. IMPORTANT: Requires Drizzle ORM or Kysely for D1 - no direct D1 adapter. v1.4.10 (Dec 2025) adds OAuth 2.1 Provider plugin (MCP deprecated), admin impersonation prevention, background tasks, Patreon/Kick/Vercel OAuth providers. v1.4.0 adds ESM-only (breaking), stateless sessions, SCIM. Use when: self-ho
